main event: An unidentified glowing object was observed in the Portland, Oregon area on 30 September 1960, moving faster than an aircraft and unique aerial maneuvering.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a marble and glowing brightly before fading,The sighting lasted for approximately 15-20 seconds,The object moved faster than traditional aircraft, halted, and then resumed motion,Initial conclusions suggested it might be astronomical phenomena, likely a meteor, but this remains inconclusive due to insufficient details,The event involved multiple witnesses including both military and civilians.
sighted object: a glowing object in the sky
